title.rendered: We’re All About That Bass (& Treble)

content.rendered:
Great jazz music is all about innovation and originality. So are we. We use that same approach when it comes to developing custom web and mobile applications.

Intellectsoft recently partnered with Made in New York Jazz – the world’s first online jazz competition. Made In New York Jazz features musicians from around the world who submit live performance videos for consideration. Winners are selected in multiple categories and receive an invitation to perform live in New York City at the annual gala event.

This year’s gala event was held on Saturday, June 27th and featured some of the world’s greatest jazz artists, including Randy Brecker, Alex Blake, Bobby Sanabria and Yaacov Mayman. Click here to see our Facebook Photo Album from the gala.

Intellectsoft is proud to support artists who are changing the world with music and to provide the technology that will help share this music with future generations. If you’d like to get involved with Made in New York Jazz, you can contact the organization here.

And, if you’re thinking about creating an original and innovative mobile or web app for your organization, contact us. Let’s make beautiful music together.

excerpt.rendered: Great jazz music is all about innovation and originality. So are we. We use that same approach when it comes to developing custom web and mobile applications.
